summary.span: 允许应用程序开发人员使用单个 API 轻松访问计算机的位置。

span.span: Allows application developers to easily access the computer's location by using a single API.

summary.span: 位置信息可能来自多个提供程序，例如 GPS、Wi-Fi 三角测量和移动电话塔三角测量。

span.span: Location information may come from multiple providers, such as GPS, Wi-Fi triangulation, and cell phone tower triangulation.

summary.span: 类提供一个 API，用于在一台计算机上封装多个位置提供程序，并支持在这些提供程序之间无缝地区分优先级和转换。

span.span: The classes provide a single API to encapsulate the multiple location providers on a computer and support seamless prioritization and transitioning between them.

summary.span: 因此，使用此 API 的应用程序开发人员不需要定制应用程序特定的硬件配置。

span.span: As a result, application developers who use this API do not need to tailor applications to specific hardware configurations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供基于纬度和经度坐标的位置数据。The class supplies location data that is based on latitude and longitude coordinates. 和 类型提供了从坐标位置解析为市政地址的能力。The and types provide the ability to resolve from a coordinate location to a civic address. 此外，还 可以实现接口，以扩展提供的位置数据的类型。Additionally, the interface can be implemented to extend the types of location data that are supplied. 在 Windows 7 中， 如果安装了位置提供程序并可以确定计算机的位置，则所有类都能完全正常运行。In Windows 7, all the classes are fully functional if a location provider is installed and can determine the computer's location. 在 Windows 7 Starter Edition 上，可在 "控制面板" 中设置的默认位置提供程序是唯一受支持的位置提供程序。On Windows 7 Starter Edition, the Default Location Provider that can be set in Control Panel is the only location provider that is supported. **注意** 在 Windows 7 之前的 Windows 版本中，以下条件适用：**Note** In versions of Windows prior to Windows 7, the following conditions apply: - 可以创建具有构造函数的所有对象，但 属性将始终具有值 。All objects that have constructors can be created, but the property will always have the value . - 由的属性指示的位置 将始终为 。The location indicated by the property of will always be . - 不会引发位置事件。No location events will be raised.
